statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Consider the aggregate An= { 1, 2, …, n }. For example, A1={1}, A3={1,2,3}. A subset sequence is defined as a array of a non-empty subset. Sort all the subset sequece of An in lexicography order. Your task is to find the m-th one.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: The input contains several test cases. Each test case consists of two numbers n and m ( 0< n<= 20, 0< m<= the total number of the subset sequence of An ).

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, you should output the m-th subset sequence of An in one line.
